sources.title: Doorway to Suspicion (1954) COLD WAR THRILLER
sources.description:
üçï1st Time on YouTubeüçï
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Jeffrey Lynn, Linda Caroll, Fred Baker
Director: Dallas Bower

Cold War meets Film Noir! An American band leader is caught in a crescendo of suspicion and deceit when he falls hard for a mysterious blonde in Post-War Germany.

metadata.Plot: American band-leader in Germany marries girl working for "The Party". She is kidnapped into Eastern Zone, but in return the band-leader kidnaps the girlfriend of a Russian General.
metadata.Actors: Jeffrey Lynn, Linda Caroll, Fred Baker
